name: Perfect Pedestrian (Demo)
description:
Welcome to the Traffic High School for young students! As one of the few pedestrians in this country, you'll have to go to class while meeting some of your Traffic Signs classmates. Make friends, fall in love, and discover the secret hidden in your city... if you can.

Demo features:
  • Play as a pedestrian in a world of speaking traffic signs.
  • A crazy storyline.
  • 6 characters.
  • 6 routes.
Final version features:
  • You will still play as a pedestrian.
  • A more insane storyline.
  • More that 15 characters, each one of them with their own story, dreams and personality.
  • More than 15 endings.
  • A megazillion words (not joking, I lost count somewhere on November).
  • Star wipes!
  • Also featuring Larry.

What are yoy waiting for? Come to Perfect Pedestrian world and discover the true love with a traffic sign!
